website_summaries.verdict: Uses an overlay across the back of the batting gloves to give you a bit more durability than some others.
pros: Gloves that offer a bit more thickness than others to enhance longevity, but they still stretch and flex nicely
Single piece in the palm to enhance comfort
Pick from 10 different camo-inspired color combinations that look great
Uses a thick wrist padding area to soak up sweat and keep the gloves drier
cons: Price point is a bit higher than most pairs of gloves
Adjustable wrist strap is a little small

customer_reviews.title: I've been playing baseball my whole life so to spend the kind of money on these gloves and to have this happen is very disappoin
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these batting gloves last week and after the first time using them in the batting cages for a 30 minute session, they are already starting to tear. I've been playing baseball my whole life so to spend the kind of money on these gloves and to have this happen is very disappointing and I do not recommend anyone purchasing these from DeMarini. - I will post a picture if wanted/needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gloves ripped in half taking off in less than 10 at bats - worthless!!
customer_reviews.text: My son used these gloves just two games. During the third game they ripped almost in half when he tried to unvelcro them (see pic). He liked the gloves but they are poorly made with low quality materials. Complete wast of money. Not sure if Amazon will replace since used, but the cheapest gloves should last more than 5 at bats and these weren’t cheap. Will never buy Demarini again.
customer_reviews.author: JFK8811

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: I’m a catcher so I use a batting glove under my mit to have more padding and all my gloves get destroyed while catching. I’ve been using these gloves for the past month or so now and they are very comfortable and let my hand breath. They got dirty a lot quicker than I thought they would but that’s the cons of sliding with gloves on🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: bsnyder@ids-troy.com

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the worst batting gloves I have ever purchased. I bought two pair thinking they would last for a couple of seasons. However, I didn't make it through one round of BP with either pair. The leather is way too soft and ripped easily from the wrist band. Not just a hold in the palm, the palm literally ripped from the glove. There is also wear within the palm that should not be there after 20 swings in a cage. Disappointing quality from a company that normally produces impeccable products.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Size Way Off
customer_reviews.text: Gloves run small. Ordered XXL and they fit tighter than most other brands XL. Would have returned for a refund if I didn't need them the next day. Quality seems decent but the size is way off.
customer_reviews.author: Fal06

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, excellente price and the quality good. It was what I expected. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel A. Vindiola Robles

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect
customer_reviews.text: Some batting gloves are too think/heavy. Other are too thin. Originally bought because it matched my daughters college team colors. She's brutal on gloves. These have lasted nicely
customer_reviews.author: Big Az

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!! These are awful. No grip what so ever. Trust me I been playing baseball my entire life. My advice. Try on some of your teammates and see which one you like best. Also wranglings workhorse is a good one as well. I will still do number 1.
customer_reviews.author: Art Vandelay

customer_reviews.title: Works great and sizing is on target
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of gloves and the sizing is on target. Pricing of $17.54 with free shipping is a fantastic price for the product. I'll be getting another pair or two.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Gee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome casual use batting glove
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and soft leather like feel. they do wear relatively quick though because they are made from such a soft material.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon White

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality glove
customer_reviews.text: nice gloves but one of the thumbs was a little smaller than the other. Not a huge deal, the right one fit just a little tighter than the left one.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Walden

customer_reviews.title: gloves are great except that there was a finger or two that ...
customer_reviews.text: gloves are great except that there was a finger or two that was not stitched correctly. The pinky and index fingers on one of the gloves is deformed and won't allow the glove to on those fingers to fully go in
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Should've got a small as they were ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Should've got a small as they were for my daughter but other than that they seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory T. Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: seams ripped after one season. hit hella dingers with them tho. great gloves if you don’t bat properly cause you probably won’t rip them sitting the bench. but who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Mathias Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $
customer_reviews.text: Less than a mo. Nice feel last 3 weeks with an aggressive batter 15 yr daughter
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Good overall glove
customer_reviews.text: There is not a lot of grip for the batting glove. Would not recommend using it as a glove underneath your mit. Slips in the leather. Durable when sliding and is very breathable keeping the hand dry.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fadil

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, not Demarini quality we expect, seems like a knock off
customer_reviews.text: Look nice but don’t last at all! Daughter wore for 4 weeks during winter conditioning practice for travel softball and they already have holes in them, just from practice batting! Would not buy again. Would like a refund but can’t contact seller...
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bass

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for my husband who ya very large hands and these actually fit and were comfortable. Great brand and product
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size. Ordered for my husband who ya very large hands and these actually fit and were comfortable. Great brand and product. Very durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UNACCEPTABLE
customer_reviews.text: One of the gloves ripped after just over 1 month of use (and 1 week after the return window closed...). My 12 year old son only used them for indoor practices. I would NOT recommend getting these gloves. UNACCEPTABLE.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Maikkula

customer_reviews.title: Look good, feel good
customer_reviews.text: Look good, feel good. Held up to a season of slow pitch with no problems. Not the “grippiest” pair of batting gloves I’ve ever owned but no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will tear easy.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves started off as being a good set but within a month of me using them they began to tear at the palm. I only play men’s softball once a week to give and indication on how often it’s used. I would not recommend if your looking for a durable glove that will last.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Quality batting glove
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's second pair. They really hold up. First pair lasted thru winter training and a full 50 game season.
customer_reviews.author: frank balden

customer_reviews.title: Weak Seams
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable out of the box. Seemed like quality gloves but seams came apart on week 5. No longer usable. Will go back to Nike.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: As pervious complaints, my gloves also ripped at the seam near the thumb on the left glove.
customer_reviews.author: Club 27

customer_reviews.title: One month
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and my son said the fit great and were comfortable but after a month into the high school season they have already torn in the curve of the thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Klong

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, grip great, but ripped the index finger after 1 season (about 10 games)
customer_reviews.author: Bryon

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: The stitching came right off the left hand glove at the wrist after two games. they are comfortable, however, poor construction has zero durability.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M.

customer_reviews.title: They were purchased because DeMarini is a good brand, not sure why these didn't last
customer_reviews.text: These ripped after just a few months and we've had to buy new ones again. They were purchased because DeMarini is a good brand, not sure why these didn't last. I wish they had some kind of guarantee considering how expensive they are generally.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gloves
customer_reviews.text: Glove look amazing and are truly comfortable. I did forget to take of gloves while running one slide and I put a tiny hole in them. Grip is still solid and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: These gloves look nice, but they are very poorly made. Like others mentioned, my gives ripped fairly quickly. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Gloves ripped after 4 uses. The seller also doesn't stand behind the product.
customer_reviews.author: Car Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Weak velcro straps
customer_reviews.text: Ive had these gloves for literally 10 games and the velcro strap already ripped about 4 games ago. These arent cheap and I usually love Demarini products but the velcro straps are notreinforced and rip off at the seam. This is the first pair Of gloves ive had this problem with that werent at least over a year old.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Tarascio

customer_reviews.title: Difficult sizing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift and was unsure of sizing, the gloves were delivered on time and they seem to be of good quality but I can't be sure until I get them in the right size. I was unaware if they were adult sizes or child sizing so I got a medium but it was too large
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Felt great wearing and swinging. Ordered a size to small I guess. I like my gloves tight but these ripped the 3rd time I wore them. But overall good. Would buy again. Just a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent glove, always fit perfect and last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material-
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter and the ripped completely down the middle of both on the first day!!
customer_reviews.author: Softball mom

customer_reviews.title: These are terrible
customer_reviews.text: We have bought the same pair 2x and both times they ripped with 1 month of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James Relihan

customer_reviews.title: We’re good gloves while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: sizes run kinda small so get the next size up. Gloves lasted a season after that got crusty and ripped 3 months later. We’re good gloves while they lasted tho
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Great design for batting gloves and good padding for the back of your hand. Just in case a ball hits that part
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for several months now. I play softball about 3 times per week
customer_reviews.author: eddy sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter who is plays every weekend in tournament softball. She will be using them her freshman year at college this fall as well.
customer_reviews.author: BIG DADDY MATTY

customer_reviews.title: Great Glove!
customer_reviews.text: Great glove with traction. Perfect for my u12 player. Thick material lasts longer than other gloves. Son loves these.
customer_reviews.author: CalDad46

customer_reviews.title: Nice Baseball Gloves
customer_reviews.text: They are great. My grandson loves them. This is the second pair he’s had, outgrew the first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald G.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved the first air and requested another pair for next ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved the first air and requested another pair for next year, just in case we can't find them again!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Younker

customer_reviews.title: Camo batting gloves.
customer_reviews.text: The size was a little higher than we thought but the batting gloves come exactly how they are pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Jennette D Belmonte

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves. Haven’t ripped and have worn them for about 4-5 seasons now. Most my gloves rip after a season or 2
customer_reviews.author: Christian frisby

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but dont last
customer_reviews.text: Barely lasted a week before the stitching between the glove and the wrist wrap started to unravel and start separating
customer_reviews.author: James kitzman II

customer_reviews.title: Grip wears out
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I’ve had them for a few weeks and they already have no grip. Kinda disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Chase Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gloves. Second pair I've bought
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gloves. Second pair I've bought. I wear mine under my glove in the field also and they held up all year. Great gloves that fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality I stylish too. These fit like a glove
customer_reviews.author: Dean Shackle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great batting gloves. Better than all the other ones that I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves , Good fitting
customer_reviews.text: Good gloves , very comfortable! Just need to be made thicker or better quality In the palms and fingers because they tear after time
customer_reviews.author: BullDog@NY

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Rec'd May 13, holes in them an unusable by June 25. Not happy, plan to purchase a different brand as well as see if DeMarini has a warranty on these.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very solid pair of gloves
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the thick feel to these. There is an actual cushion to them.
customer_reviews.author: smithgroup22

customer_reviews.title: Tight thumbs
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs could be a little longer and not so tight
customer_reviews.author: Jacob west

customer_reviews.title: Poor pair of gloves....
customer_reviews.text: These ripped during first game. Ordered an XXL and received an XL. Not happy....
customer_reviews.author: MorganFamily

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Ripped on one of the fingers within the first month of using them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Still look brand new going on 4th slow pitch season.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Carvell

customer_reviews.title: Ripped with little use!
customer_reviews.text: Ripped on seams after a few weeks of use! Only had practice twice a week for an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Julander

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace original pair after using a week second pair lasted a month
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son wore the gloves at a baseball clinic and ...
customer_reviews.text: My son wore the gloves at a baseball clinic and they ripped the first day. I was mailed another pair at no cost. The second pair ripped after a week of batting practice.
customer_reviews.author: willmitchell3

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No padding, gave my daughter major blisters on her hands
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lee

customer_reviews.title: Other then that they are a good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit just right except the thumb. It was way to tight. Other then that they are a good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The glove design and feel is great. Too bad it ripped after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the gloves. Very fast turnaround on order and delivery. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great in looks, low in quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually disappointed to write a negative review on this product. As a user of DeMarini bats and batting gloves they normally deliver a quality product. The gloves fit good. During the process of my first at bat I noticed a tear down the inner hem. After 3 more at bats my left hand glove was toast. I'd hoped to get more than a game out of the gloves. I still use their bats but I'm apprehensive of using their batting gloves for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

product_meta.title: DeMarini Digi Camo II Batting Gloves
product_meta.description:
Rock the DeMarini Digi Camo Batting Glove all season long. The Digi Camo Batting Glove offers a classic feel with relief along the knuckle bends and a smooth leather palm for supreme comfort. You won't blend in wearing these camo gloves. Smooth sheep skin leather palm for supreme comfort Four-Way Stretch with ribbed backhand Pro Grade Wrist Strap that wicks away moisture Silicon Overlay Backhand for added structure




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :11.81 x 4.14 x 0.66 inches; 2.88 Ounces
 * Item model number :WTD6113SCL
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Date First Available :August 1, 2016
 * Manufacturer :DeMarini
 * ASIN :B01IOXE7QC

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #180,665 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #138 inBaseball & Softball Batting Gloves 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.2 out of 5 stars217 ratings Rock the DeMarini Digi Camo Batting Glove all season long. The Digi Camo Batting Glove offers a classic feel with relief along the knuckle bends and a smooth leather palm for supreme comfort. You won't blend in wearing these camo gloves. Smooth sheep skin leather palm for supreme comfort Four-Way Stretch with ribbed backhand Pro Grade Wrist Strap that wicks away moisture Silicon Overlay Backhand for added structure
feature_bullets: Smooth sheep skin leather palm for supreme comfort
Pro Grade Wrist Strap that wicks away moisture
Silicon Overlay Backhand for added structure
Classic feel with relief along the knuckle bends
